scripts.pi-upload: zip -FSr dist/CAROS.zip dist/CAROS-linux-armv7l/ && scp /Volumes/Data/Personal/electron-car-os/dist/CAROS.zip pi@192.168.86.26:/home/pi && ssh pi@192.168.86.26 'unzip -o /home/pi/CAROS.zip'
scripts.full-pi-upload: electron-packager ./ CAROS --target=deb --platform=linux --arch=armv7l  --overwrite --out dist/ --executableName=obd-car-os && zip -FSr dist/CAROS.zip dist/CAROS-linux-armv7l/ && scp /Volumes/Data/Personal/electron-car-os/dist/CAROS.zip pi@192.168.86.26:/home/pi && ssh pi@192.168.86.26 'unzip -o /home/pi/CAROS.zip'
